title: Dan Held
body:
IP Objective: Dan Held
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 500 000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 1 000 000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01  18:00
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.05    19:00

A Bitcoin entrepreneur, Held is currently the Director of Growth Marketing at Kraken. He’s active on Twitter, where he explains all things Bitcoin and makes crypto more accessible. On the platform, he has approximately 257,000 followers. He runs his own Substack newsletter and a website and writes on Medium about Bitcoin and Kraken.
author: 0x6c665834015f725Bd27FECDA2394806BE3b8D6d9
